attributes.action: Take a vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson and Ministers for Covid response
attributes.additional_details:
The government have repeatedly lied to the British public;
1. About the true extent of deaths recorded as Covid
2. Adopted an underhand approach and reneged on its promises; Mr Johnson initially stated Covid passports would not be a requirement for pubs and similar venues but has now stated that they will be mandatory thus proving themselves to be faithless and untrustworthy.

The economy is being destroyed; repeated lockdowns have caused permeant business closures and loss of jobs.
attributes.background: Take a vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson and his ministers. Their response to the Covid 'crisis' has been erratic, disorganised and draconian. Freedoms and liberties are being  stripped away - inability to protest, police arrests for 'alleged breaking' of Covid 'rules' - just  two examples.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

You might like to sign the following petition:

Hold an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
